PokerPlayerMod:BadJoker.NAME: Bad Joker
PokerPlayerMod:BadJoker.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random pokerplayer:non-Heart Poker Cards to add to your hand. It has Ethereal.

PokerPlayerMod:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
PokerPlayerMod:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Draw cards until you have 5 cards in hand.

PokerPlayerMod:TrumpStrike.NAME: Trump Strike
PokerPlayerMod:TrumpStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage (number of Poker cards in your deck). NL Draw !M! card.
PokerPlayerMod:TrumpStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage (number of Poker cards in your deck). NL Draw !M! cards.

PokerPlayerMod:ThinkingTime.NAME: Thinking Time
PokerPlayerMod:ThinkingTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL (number of Poker cards in your deck). NL Draw !M! card.
PokerPlayerMod:ThinkingTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL (number of Poker cards in your deck). NL Draw !M! cards.

PokerPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.NAME: Diamond Strike
PokerPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a !M! of pokerplayer:Diamonds with Ethereal into your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:SpadeStrike.NAME: Spade Strike
PokerPlayerMod:SpadeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a !M! of pokerplayer:Spades with Ethereal into your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:ClubStrike.NAME: Club Strike
PokerPlayerMod:ClubStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a !M! of pokerplayer:Clubs with Ethereal into your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:HeartStrike.NAME: Heart Strike
PokerPlayerMod:HeartStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a !M! of pokerplayer:Hearts into your hand. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:CloakAndDiamond.NAME: Cloak and Diamond
PokerPlayerMod:CloakAndDiamond.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a !M! of pokerplayer:Diamonds with Ethereal into your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:ClubsClub.NAME: Clubs Club
PokerPlayerMod:ClubsClub.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage for each pokerplayer:Club in your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:DartThrow.NAME: Dart Throw
PokerPlayerMod:DartThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

PokerPlayerMod:FlyingCard.NAME: Flying Card
PokerPlayerMod:FlyingCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage for each card generated in this combat.

PokerPlayerMod:Configure.NAME: Configure
PokerPlayerMod:Configure.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

PokerPlayerMod:Extraction.NAME: Extraction
PokerPlayerMod:Extraction.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand. If it is a Poker card, gain energy equal to its pokerplayer:Rank.

PokerPlayerMod:MagicTrick.NAME: Magic Trick
PokerPlayerMod:MagicTrick.DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. NL Discard !M! cards.
PokerPlayerMod:MagicTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have 8 cards in hand. NL Discard !M! cards.

PokerPlayerMod:Raise.NAME: Raise
PokerPlayerMod:Raise.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL You may choose a Poker card in you hand to raise its pokerplayer:Rank by !M!.

PokerPlayerMod:HotShotCut.NAME: Hot Shot Cut
PokerPlayerMod:HotShotCut.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Poker cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each of them. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:Manipulation.NAME: Manipulation
PokerPlayerMod:Manipulation.DESCRIPTION: For the next X turns, gain [E] [E]. NL You may increase the pokerplayer:Rank of one Poker Card by X. NL Exhaust.
PokerPlayerMod:Manipulation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the next X turns, gain [E] [E]. NL You may increase the pokerplayer:Rank of one Poker Card by X.

PokerPlayerMod:SecondChance.NAME: Second Chance
PokerPlayerMod:SecondChance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Repeat until you have 5 cards in hand.

PokerPlayerMod:ClubDance.NAME: Club Dance
PokerPlayerMod:ClubDance.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random pokerplayer:Clubs to add to your hand. It has Ethereal.

PokerPlayerMod:FillThePot.NAME: Fill the Pot
PokerPlayerMod:FillThePot.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! random non-Poker cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:HiddenCard.NAME: Hidden Card
PokerPlayerMod:HiddenCard.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Poker Card from your discard pile.
PokerPlayerMod:HiddenCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Poker Card from your discard pile. Gain Block equal to its pokerplayer:Rank.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Poker Cards in my discard pile.

PokerPlayerMod:JackOfSpades.NAME: Jack of Spades
PokerPlayerMod:JackOfSpades.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:Overdeal.NAME: Overdeal
PokerPlayerMod:Overdeal.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage. NL Add X random Poker cards into your hand. NL Exhaust.
PokerPlayerMod:Overdeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X+1 damage. Add X+1 random Poker cards into your hand. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:RiskyBet.NAME: Risky Bet
PokerPlayerMod:RiskyBet.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card and draw a card. If they are both Poker cards with the same pokerplayer:Suit, gain [E] and draw !M! cards.

PokerPlayerMod:CardPrinter.NAME: Card Printer
PokerPlayerMod:CardPrinter.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a pokerplayer:non-Heart, pokerplayer:Rank !M! Poker card to your draw pile.

PokerPlayerMod:DamnStraight.NAME: Damn Straight
PokerPlayerMod:DamnStraight.DESCRIPTION: pokerplayer:Showdown bonus from Straight is doubled.
PokerPlayerMod:DamnStraight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL pokerplayer:Showdown bonus from Straight is doubled.

PokerPlayerMod:ClubShade.NAME: Club Shade
PokerPlayerMod:ClubShade.DESCRIPTION: Your pokerplayer:Clubs give you !M! Block as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.
PokerPlayerMod:ClubShade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Your pokerplayer:Clubs give you !M! Block as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.

PokerPlayerMod:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
PokerPlayerMod:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Your pokerplayer:Diamonds deal !M! more damage during pokerplayer:Showdown.
PokerPlayerMod:Sharpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Your pokerplayer:Diamonds deal !M! more damage during pokerplayer:Showdown.

PokerPlayerMod:ChangeRules.NAME: Flip Table
PokerPlayerMod:ChangeRules.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

PokerPlayerMod:RoyalStrike.NAME: Royal Strike
PokerPlayerMod:RoyalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Discard a Poker card. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the pokerplayer:Rank of it.

PokerPlayerMod:VarietyAttack.NAME: Variety Attack
PokerPlayerMod:VarietyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Damage is doubled for each unique pokerplayer:Suit of Poker Cards in your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
PokerPlayerMod:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Poker Card from your hand. Add a copy of that card into your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:ItsShowtime.NAME: It's Showtime!
PokerPlayerMod:ItsShowtime.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Trigger the pokerplayer:Showdown. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:Promotion.NAME: Promotion
PokerPlayerMod:Promotion.DESCRIPTION: Raise the pokerplayer:Rank of ALL Poker cards by !M! for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:TheDieIsCast.NAME: The Die is Cast!
PokerPlayerMod:TheDieIsCast.DESCRIPTION: Throw a dice. NL Choose any number of Poker cards in your hand to change their pokerplayer:Rank to the dice roll.
PokerPlayerMod:TheDieIsCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Throw a loaded dice. NL Choose any number of Poker cards in your hand to change their pokerplayer:Rank to the dice roll.

PokerPlayerMod:WildCard.NAME: Wild Card
PokerPlayerMod:WildCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 from ALL Poker Cards to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:FakeSymbols.NAME: Fake Symbols
PokerPlayerMod:FakeSymbols.DESCRIPTION: You score a Flush if you have 4 or more Poker Cards with same pokerplayer:Suit during pokerplayer:Showdown.
PokerPlayerMod:FakeSymbols.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL You score a Flush if you have 4 or more Poker Cards with same pokerplayer:Suit during pokerplayer:Showdown.

PokerPlayerMod:GamblerForm.NAME: Gambler Form
PokerPlayerMod:GamblerForm.DESCRIPTION: If you score Two Pair or better, the pokerplayer:Showdown effect of all Poker cards are increased by !M! .
PokerPlayerMod:GamblerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you score Two Pair or better, the pokerplayer:Showdown effect of all Poker cards are increased by !M! .

PokerPlayerMod:StackedDeck.NAME: Stacked Deck
PokerPlayerMod:StackedDeck.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.
PokerPlayerMod:StackedDeck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL At the start of your turn, Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.

PokerPlayerMod:Harden.NAME: Harden
PokerPlayerMod:Harden.DESCRIPTION: Your pokerplayer:Spades give you !M! Block next turn as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.
PokerPlayerMod:Harden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Your pokerplayer:Spades give you !M! Block next turn as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.

PokerPlayerMod:PoorCopy.NAME: Poor Copy
PokerPlayerMod:PoorCopy.DESCRIPTION: Choose One: Draw 1 card; or copy a Poker card from your hand and reduce the pokerplayer:Rank of the copy by 1.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Copy a Poker Card from your hand and reduce the pokerplayer:Rank of the copy by 1.

PokerPlayerMod:WasteCollection.NAME: Waste Collection
PokerPlayerMod:WasteCollection.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Poker cards ranked 3 or less from your draw pile. They have double pokerplayer:Showdown Effect for this combat. NL Exhaust.
